name: The Great Emu War (itch) (BD-UTAS)
description:
The Great Emu War - 3D Collectaphon

Play in fullscreen mode for the best experience.

Controls

Left stick - Movement

Right stick - Camera controls

Left bumper/shoulder - Run

Right bumper/shoulder - Jumping (Multiple jump combos)

South Button (A/X/ect) - Shoot Projectiles

Try collecting the giant opal!

Feedback

Want to give us feedback!? We would greatly appreciate it!
Link - https://docs.google.com/forms/d/17Ch9BXvg7Va6p8rWhxL577-I-DcqCNwOg-fOloXqUH8/vie... 

Note - This is just a prototype level to test out various mechanics. Have fun!
